episodes.title: Martha Glory Kartaoui's SHOCKING Journey from CULT Survivor to COURAGEOUS Warrior
episodes.description:
Cult Survivor to Courageous Warrior: Martha Glory Kartaoui’s Journey to Healing

Martha Glory Kartaoui transforms her harrowing cult experience into a beacon of hope. In Glory: Going All In, she shares her journey and trauma recovery insights.

In this episode of Books with Bridgetti, we are joined by Martha Glory Kartaoui, a cult survivor who has transformed her trauma into a source of healing for others. Martha shares her inspiring journey from pain to purpose and introduces us to her trauma recovery coaching program featured in her book Glory: Going All In. We dive deep into the power of faith, spiritual healing, and practical strategies to overcome trauma. If you’re searching for hope, inspiration, or tools to reclaim your life, this conversation is for you. Join us as we explore Martha’s unique approach to healing and transformation.

About the Show
Books with Bridgetti launched mid-2021.  Bridgetti Lim Banda, an international bestselling author, hosts the show and invites a lineup of literary industry experts to join her. You'll get to hear from award-winning authors, New York Times and USA Today bestsellers, and talented Indie authors.  Authors like you've never heard them before—only on “Books with Bridgetti”

About the Show Host

Bridgetti Lim Banda
Bridgetti is a visionary media personality and changemaker. As an Executive Livestream Producer, Podcast Host, and Author, she empowers individuals to shine on camera and amplify their influence. Bridgetti's dedication to social impact earns her the titles of Global Goodwill Ambassador and Invisible Disabilities Advocate. Her groundbreaking work addressing the Cape Town Water Crisis has resonated globally, earning features in prominent print and broadcast media outlets. With a passion for elevating others' voices, Bridgetti's expertise helps thought leaders and authors unlock their full potential.
